title: Game not existing after game crash
body: Was playing {{champion:4}}  in ranked and was 17/4/?  when the game crashed, we were just about to win and our game crashed (_Attempting to reconnect..._) after trying to reconnect multiple times, the client skips the post-game stats and takes me to the home screen. I look at my match history to see nothing there. Is there anything that can be done, because we were literally a **minute **away from ending the game.

replies.body:
Spooky ghost games disappearing on people.

There's probably nothing that can be done about it. I've never seen a red restore a game that may have once existed and predicted the outcome of it too.

Did you experience disconnections at any other point too, or was it just straight up cut near the end?
